author: mirichmo
body:
We need to add a wrapper script for repoapi_client.sh that dynamically updates the associated JSON files and executes them.

Sed is a good utility to use within the script. I experimented a bit and we could use something like this:
cat centos7_package.json | sed 's/VERSION_STRING/beta.2/g' > centos7_package_updated.json

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: Fixed on June 5th in the internal repo.

title: Add a Wrapper Script to repoapi_client.sh
